Colin Powell talks about the Henry Louis Gates arrest with Larry King . He said the story ''went viral'' when Barack Obama commented on the story. Also, Colin Powell thinks that America ''isn't quite post-racial'' at this time. These problems still exist in post-racial America. However, he suggested that Henry Louis Gates should not have argued with the policeman arresting him. ''You don't argue with a police officer,'' he says.
